description:
Form input to handle a date value.

Component allows some degree of free input and parses the
input value to a dayjs object. Supports rounding to a
nearest `step` as well as keyboard interactions
(altering value by arrow up/down, selecting of
input parts via tab key).

props.name: autofocus
props.description: Sets the focus on this field when the form loads. Only the first field with this label gets

props.name: disabled
props.description: If `true`, the field is no longer editable and will not be saved

props.name: id
props.description: A unique ID. The component _uid will be used as default.

props.name: name
props.description: A unique name for the input

props.name: required
props.description: If `true`, the field has to be filled in correctly to be submitted

props.name: display
props.description: Format to parse and display the date

props.name: max
props.description: The last allowed date as ISO date string

props.name: min
props.description: The first allowed date as ISO date string

props.name: step
props.description:
Rounding to the nearest step.
Requires an object with a `unit`
and a `size` key

props.name: value
props.description: Value must be provided as ISO date string

methods.name: select
methods.description:
Sets the cursor selection in the input element
that includes the provided part

methods.name: selectFirst
methods.description: Selects the first pattern if available

methods.name: selectLast
methods.description: Selects the last pattern if available

methods.name: selectNext
methods.description: Selects the next pattern if available

methods.name: selectPrev
methods.description: Selects the previous pattern if available
